meanings.sent1: Her nondance at the party was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The nondance of the shy boy caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nondance around the room was quite entertaining.

meanings.sent5: The nondance of the clouds painted a serene picture in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The nondance in the empty ballroom felt eerie.
